briefTitle: YH1 in Poorly Controlled Type 2 Diabetes

outcomeMeasures.title: The Percentage Change in HbA1c Level From Baseline to 12 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: The primary efﬁcacy endpoint was the percentage change in HbA1c levels from baseline to 12 weeks. The HbA1c level was measured by HPLC in the Department of Laboratory Medicine at Chang Gung Memorial Hospital.

outcomeMeasures.title: The Percentage Change in 2hPG From Baseline to Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: The secondary efﬁcacy endpoint was the percentage change in 2hPG level from baseline to 12 weeks by using enzymatic method in the Department of Laboratory Medicine at Chang Gung Memorial Hospital.
